newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - MicroLinear raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - MicroLinear raised to buy.

text.p: -- Robertson, Stephens & Co said analyst Elias Moosa raised his rating on MicroLinear Corp to buy from long-term attractive after the company reported earnings of $0.11 a share on revenues of $13.4 million for the fourth quarter.
-- In a statement, Moosa said, "After a five-quarter streak of flat booking trends, overall bookings for the company exploded in Q4, dramatically improving visibility."
-- He raised his 1997 earnings estimate to $0.55 a share from $0.25, and established a 1998 estimate of $0.85 and on revenues of $88 million.
-- He put a price target of $15 on the stock.
-- MicroLinear shares were up one at 11-1/2 at midday.
